dublinCore.dc:title: HR 558 ENR: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 55 South Pioneer Boulevard in Springboro, Ohio, as the “Richard Dick Chenault Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.congress: One Hundred Fourteenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Tuesday, the sixth day of January, two thousand and fifteen
form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 55 South Pioneer Boulevard in Springboro, Ohio, as the Richard Dick Chenault Post Office Building.

section.header: Richard Dick Chenault Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 55 South Pioneer Boulevard in Springboro, Ohio, shall be known and designated as the Richard Dick Chenault Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Richard Dick Chenault Post Office Building.

attestation-group.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
